Name: Outdefine
Description:
Meet Debbie by Outdefine. Debbie is your AI powered recruiter. Debbie works 24x7, helping you recruit and scale faster.

Talent can interview with Debbie to qualify for global jobs with companies hiring on Outdefine and earn DEF tokens.

Name: Dodo Payments
Description: Dodo Payments helps digital businesses launch and accept global payments by offering 30+ local payment methods and automating payment compliance.

Name: Boulo Solutions
Description:
Successful recruiting starts with a connection.

We immerse ourselves in your requirements and company culture to find candidates who perfectly align with your vision. Our innovative technology and boutique approach accelerate hiring, boost retention, and build cohesive teams that last years.

With responsible AI and deep expertise behind the scenes, Boulo highlights skills and lived experiences of our candidates, enabling employers to select the best talent for current and future needs.

To post a job or view our active jobs, visit https://boulosolutions.com/

Name: RampUp, Inc.
Description:
RampUp helps companies find the right talent at the right time through our experienced recruitment teams and AI-powered technology. Find great talent while saving costs through our full-stack recruiting models that give you flexibility in hiring.

We work with a wide variety of industries and functional roles spanning sales, marketing, finance, design, engineering, Aesthetics, Medical Device, Digital Health Technology, Healthcare, HVAC and many more!

Name: Chezuba
Description:
Born from a vision to facilitate every skill and every passion in the world in meeting a social need, Chezuba is a platform that connects corporations with customized volunteer opportunities for their employees.

Chezuba provides high-quality volunteering experiences in scalable, gamified and skill-based formats, as well as supports HR departments in creating seamless volunteer and employee giving experiences and tracking measures of success.  

Through the years, Chezuba has become a trusted leader in the virtual volunteering space, having curated high-quality experiences for large multi-national companies as well as SMBs.

To date, Chezuba has partnered with non-profits in 100+ countries. Chezuba is listed in Forbes 30 under 30 and has been accelerated by 500 startups. With offices in the US and India, Chezuba boasts of a truly diverse and passionate team who strive to make volunteering fun, easy and accessible to all.

Name: Wripple
Description:
Wripple is Marketing’s On-Demand Talent Platform. 

Founded by agency veterans, Wripple is 100% dedicated to providing marketers with boundless possibilities to create high-performing blended teams with greater speed, flexibility, and efficiency.   

Our Private Talent Marketplace, powered by advanced proprietary software with generative AI, connects vetted on-demand talent with top brands, in real time. For all your staffing priorities, hire contractors across 50+ roles to fully fold into your team. For project-based work, engage individual freelancers or ready-made teams curated to tackle a wide range of initiatives. Whatever your need, Wripple has you covered. 

Wripple's software simplifies and automates the entire hiring process. Set search criteria, find matches immediately, interview talent, and kick off in as little as 24 hours. Wripple handles compliance, onboarding, and administrative HR duties, like payment and insurance. Wripple Client Leads, all former agency professionals, are available throughout the process to ensure everyone is set up for success.  

And to maintain valuable relationships with on-demand talent, use Wripple’s Private Talent Pools. Whether sourced by Wripple or directly by you, Wripple offers the convenience of organizing all on-demand talent on a single platform. With talent pools, directly invite saved talent to propose on projects, easily re-hire for new projects, and view talent history with your company, all in one place. 

Learn how Wripple can help you build and manage a high-performing modern marketing workforce of blended teams.

Name: ThisWay Global
Description:
Headquartered in the tech hub of Austin, Texas, our diverse team of leaders brings their organizational expertise from renowned companies like Apple, Walt Disney, and the Department of Defence. At ThisWay, we believe in the boundless opportunities that emerge when solutions are open, unbiased, and available to the world.
The platform has been developed by a diverse and experienced team from HR tech and artificial intelligence industries, all passionately solving a problem they experienced in their careers. The company is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

Name: Humantic AI
Description:
Humantic AI provides previously impossible intelligence about the buyers to salespeople. While most AI solutions focus on the seller, Humantic AI is unique in focusing on the buyer instead. 

Our agentic Account Intelligence product and People Intelligence product equip sellers with complete Buyer Intelligence in minutes. Combined with Gen AI, it revolutionizes how buyers buy (or view your product). 

Our customers include industry pioneers across a variety of sectors like AWS, Mitel, and Sandler. It is also taught as part of coursework at universities like Indiana University and Baylor University.

We has also been recognized multiple times on G2 as a Leader, High Performer and Momentum Leader in 2025.

Name: Narrato
Description:
Narrato is an AI content platform for marketers and creators to create winning content collaboratively faster and better. Narrato turbo-boosts the entire content creation journey - from ideation, planning, creation, optimization, collaboration to publishing. 

Select features of the platform:
- AI content creation, ideation and optimization assistant
- Content project management including tasks assignment, tracking and management
- Content workflow automation
- Advanced content editor with an AI writing assistant that helps with content creation, readability, grammar and structuring improvements, and plagiarism checks
- Get automated SEO content briefs to scale the ranks on SERPs
- Content calendar, AI content ideas generator and other planning features
- Generate stunning AI images from text
- Create and use custom content templates
- Organize content and projects in folders and maintain content repository
- Content publishing automation
- Freelancer payments management
- Client content delivery, feedback and collaboration for marketing agencies
- Content marketplace to hire writers ( https://narrato.io/marketplace/ )

Other features: Guidelines and Brand Assets Repository, Multi-Language Support, Free Image Search, Integrations with ChatGPT and Canva, Custom Integrations with Zapier and API, Custom Reports and more.

Name: ClientSuccess
Description:
ClientSuccess is revolutionizing the way SaaS companies manage, retain, and grow their existing customer base. We help SaaS companies proactively manage customer relationships, measure customer health, minimize churn and maximize revenue. 

We believe that SaaS is more than software and service. It’s about relationships. Think beyond acquisition and support. You want a customer for life. And not one that exists because they’re locked into a contract. You want a customer that chooses to partner with you because you help them accomplish their goals and succeed—through personal relationships and delightful experiences. 

You succeed when your customers succeed. In the day of big data, don’t forget that its people using your product. There are a lot of services offering to tell you what they’re doing, but that’s not enough. You need to know why. That’s how you reduce churn and increase revenue.

ClientSuccess is a simple yet sophisticated solution that both the front-line CSMs and the Executive team will love. For the CSMs, we bring together the tools, best practices, insights and analytics they need to proactively manage their customers. For the Executives, we deliver the deep analytics, metric and reports to provide a comprehensive view of the health of their SaaS business. Our clients love to use our solution. Every day, all day.

Name: Future AGI
Description:
At Future AGI, we enable developers and businesses to build and deliver their AI systems in days (not months). Designed for the modern era of Generative AI, our innovative platform provides intuitive tools for fine-tuning prompts, LLM experimentation, evaluating models, annotating data or optimizing performance, making complex AI workflows seamless and efficient. 

Future AGI delivers solutions that drive 10x faster results, 99% accurate outcomes, and 100% customer satisfaction. All of this can be done without human-in-the-loop or golden dataset!

Backed by US & Singapore based investors, cutting-edge research and proprietary evaluation metrics, our platform ensures that every step of your AI workflow is efficient, reliable, and impactful. Trusted by startups and Fortune500 enterprises, Future AGI is helping teams unlock the full potential of AI to deliver smarter, faster, and more scalable solutions.

Name: Productside
Description:
We are in the service of Product Leaders and Managers on their journey to doing product better.

Our approach of Training + Advisory takes the guesswork out of Product Management helping teams work better and achieve more product success in market.

Actionable Framework: Our Blueprint comes with an actionable Playbook that can be executed by any Product Manager

Leadership Engagement: We get leadership on board to support and drive the change.

Custom Training: Our training is a communication tool of the new expectations for product management and the organization and builds on the foundation you already have.

Organization-Wide Support: We ensure all parts of the organization are aligned and supportive of the change.

Measurable Wins: We incorporate ways to assess quick wins to reinforce the change.

Industry-Standard Certifications - The most respected credentials available in conjunction with our third-party certification administrator and strategic partner, AIPMM.


Check out our Free Team Assessment to see how your team stacks up on the Product Management Maturity curve.

Name: Cimba.ai
Description: Cimba.AI, the Gen-AI-native platform that gives enterprises the power to create custom adaptive AI agents that can produce deep insights and recommend and trigger business actions based on internal data and knowledge base. The platform leverages self-training artificial intelligence that learns and adapts to an organization’s unique knowledgebase(i.e., dashboards, query history, metadata, playbooks, etc.), providing business decision makers with customizable AI agents that generate both insights and recommended next steps to take based on their data (i.e., Snowflake)

Name: DARVIS
Description:
DARVIS is a health-tech innovator redefining how hospitals manage their supply chains with AI-driven computer vision.

Our flagship solution, DARVIS Digital Shelves, provides 24/7 real-time visibility into inventory by automating barcode and QR code scanning, continuously monitoring supply fill-levels, and generating actionable insights. From SKU tracking and consumption trends to expiration alerts, location-based availability, and automated reorders — we empower healthcare providers to plan with precision.

By optimizing workflows across PAR locations, we help hospitals reduce costs, prevent stockouts and hoarding, lower baseline inventory, and free up staff from manual tasks. The result: safer patient care, more satisfied teams, and measurable contributions to ESG goals.

Ready for AI-smart demand planning?  Let’s dive in!

Name: Marketing AI Institute
Description:
Marketing AI Institute helps marketers build a competitive advantage with AI by providing expert content, online education, interactive tools, strategic consulting, and live events.

Since 2016, we've published more than 900 articles to help marketers understand, pilot and scale AI. We track and analyze hundreds of AI-powered vendors with $15+ billion in combined funding. And we partner with top AI-first companies to bring the industry-exclusive insights straight from the cutting-edge of AI adoption and implementation.

This work has turned our team into industry-leading experts on the potential opportunities and practical considerations presented by AI in marketing. We share this expertise through actionable content, online education, and in-depth resources to help you take your company and career to the next level with AI.

Name: Peakflo (YC W22)
Description:
Peakflo agentic workflows allows enterprises to streamline their finance and operations processes. 100+ teams, use Peakflo to: 

 Save 2000 man-hours/month on finance ops  
 Get paid faster on customer invoices by 15-25 days 
 Cut vendor bill payment time by 50% 
 Streamline travel and expense reimbursements

Name: Tucuvi
Description:
Tucuvi is a leading Voice AI platform that empowers health systems to enhance patient outreach and optimize care delivery. Using clinically validated Conversational AI, Tucuvi automates routine care processes, allowing clinical teams to focus on patients who need the most urgent attention. Our platform seamlessly integrates with existing health IT infrastructure and is scalable across health systems of any size. With over 40 customizable clinical protocols—ranging from transitional care to long-term chronic care management—we've improved care with over 1 million patient-facing calls, delivering the highest patient engagement and measurable outcomes in the industry. Also, in Europe, Tucuvi is the only CE-marked platform offering fully automated and secure low-risk phone consultations cross-pathology. 
Listen to a call here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvCDpxAgTfM

Name: AdsGency AI
Description: #1 innovative CDP, connect your data and turn it into actionable campaigns!

Name: Etleap
Description: Etleap streamlines data ingestion and modeling, making it effortless for teams to create data products. It handles ingestion, transformation, and observability in a single platform, connecting to databases, applications, APIs, files, and streams. With built-in dbt and SQL support, deep pipeline monitoring, and deployment options in your AWS VPC or as a managed SaaS, Etleap provides enterprise-grade security, predictable pricing, and best-in-class support. Data end-users get the insights they need without IT bottlenecks, while data teams focus on building, not troubleshooting.

Name: Yellowpop
Description:
We design and produce custom signage that elevates spaces, builds recognition, and drives results. From LED neon and channel letters to lightboxes and 3D signs, we deliver bold visual solutions with design at the core.

Our team partners with clients early in the process to shape signage that’s not only beautiful — but purposeful. Whether for retail, hospitality, fitness, or corporate environments, our work blends creativity, craftsmanship, and performance.

In parallel, our LED neon art collections — available through both direct-to-consumer and wholesale channels — bring vibrant design pieces into homes, shops, and galleries worldwide.

 LED neon, channel letters, lightboxes, dimensional signage
 End-to-end creative and production support
 Global fulfillment, local compliance
 Trusted by leading brands — and thousands of design lovers

Let’s build something that stands out.

Name: Zeda.io
Description:
AI-powered product discovery and strategy software that helps customer-focused teams to
Gather Customer Insights → Uncover problems to solve for customers.
Build with Product Intelligence → Decide what to build next and why.
Measure Strategy Impact → Create product strategies & measure outcomes.

Name: Figr
Description: Figr AI helps you to design products insanely fast with ease. It is your ultimate design companion, streamlining the creation of user flows, wireframes, design systems and more.

Name: SiteZeus
Description: SiteZeus is a SaaS company dedicated to helping emerging and established multi-unit businesses accelerate their growth and maximize profits through data-driven decisions. Our comprehensive Growth Suite includes solutions for franchise sales, real estate, development, marketing, and operations teams.

Name: Segwise (Creative Analytics Agents)
Description:
Segwise builds AI agents to improve creative ROAS.
Our AI agents help you automate creative tagging and simplify creative analytics, helping you save hours and improve ROAS.

Name: Activepieces
Description: Turn your organization into an AI powerhouse by the new model of deploying automation. IT deploys, everyone else builds. Activepieces is the right infrastructure for your AI transformation. By the creator of the friendliest open source no-code business automation tool.

Name: Attentions AI
Description:
Attentions is committed to innovation and expanding the ArtiGen co-pilot ecosystem, while prioritising data security and offering deployment flexibility.

Attentions is more than just an idea; it's a research-driven approach to realising the transformative power of Generative AI (Gen-AI) for businesses of all sizes.
We believe in going beyond one-size-fits-all solutions. Our focus is on helping businesses seamlessly move their Gen-AI applications from Proof of Concept (PoC) to production, achieving real-world results faster than ever before.

Mission:
Our mission is to democratise No-Code Gen-AI. We offer affordable, easy-to-use tools that empower you to build, train, and deploy private LLMs (Large Language Models) tailored to your specific needs. We believe in empowering businesses to harness the potential of Gen-AI and unlock new levels of operational efficiency.

What We Do:
Effortless PoC to Production: We bridge the gap between experimentation and implementation, helping businesses move their Gen-AI projects into production quickly and efficiently.

No-Code Gen-AI Platform: Build, train, and deploy private LLMs without writing a single line of code. Our intuitive interface makes Gen-AI accessible to everyone.

High Accuracy & Dependency: Our private LLMs are built with your specific needs in mind, ensuring exceptional accuracy and reliable performance.

Seamless Integration: Our platform integrates seamlessly with existing business data, documents ensuring a smooth and efficient workflow.

By working with Attentions, you can:
- Achieve faster time-to-value with your Gen-AI initiatives.
- Gain a competitive edge by implementing innovative AI solutions.
- Maximise operational efficiency and employee productivity.
- Unlock the transformative power of Gen-AI, tailored to your unique business needs.

We invite you to explore how Attentions can help your business unlock the full potential of No-Code Gen-AI.

#GenerativeAI#AI#NLP#NoCodeAI#TextToSQL#VoiceAI

Name: LivSYT
Description:
LivSYT is easy-to-adopt self-use SaaS-based software, designed for construction stakeholders, modular manufacturers and 3rd party inspectors to help them complete projects faster. It delivers real-time operations visibility and controls at a granular level, thereby enabling synchronised mobilisation of resources to improve job-site output. 

LivSYT eliminates inefficiencies by fundamentally shifting your organisation from memory-dependent to A.I.-driven operations. Its configurable process workflow digitisation and implementation drives compliance and accountability across your projects. With its intuitive dashboards, you get real-time project performance analytics driven by features like:

• Automated job allocation
• Integrated quality assurance
• Automated report generation
• Geo-tagging
• Push-notifications
• SOS for emergencies and more

Thus, helping you complete projects faster.

Name: Ricult
Description:
Agricultural value chains are broken in most developing countries. Farmers are unable to access affordable credit, insurance, high-quality inputs, affordable logistics providers, and competitive markets. These inefficiencies lead to high rates of farmer poverty. 75% of the worlds poor are farmers.  
Ricult is a US-based award-winning Social Enterprise founded by MIT alums that develops AI/Data/Tech/Financial-based digital solutions for the agricultural ecosystem, focusing on smallholder farmers in developing countries (currently operating in Pakistan and Thailand). Ricult is one of the few companies in the world that operates at the nexus of Fintech and Agtech.
Ricult is focused on building world-class digital products for its users based on their needs and pain points.  The current portfolio of products is already deployed with more than 500,000 farmers and other leading stakeholders in the agriculture value chain.

Name: OLake by Datazip
Description: Fastest open-source tool for replicating Databases to Apache Iceberg or Data Lakehouse.  Efficient, quick and scalable data ingestion for real-time analytics.

Name: RISA
Description: Resilient infrastructure empowering mission-critical institutions to tackle humanity’s hardest hurdles.

Name: Talentpair
Description:
Talentpair: Your Personal AI Recruiter, Powered by a Decade of Expertise
Hiring just got smarter and faster with TalentpaiIr – your personal AI recruiter designed for internal hiring teams, talent acquisition professionals, and hiring managers. Backed by 10 years of real hiring data, TalentpAIr morphed the expertise & data of a top-tier contingent recruiting firm into an AI-driven platform, making hiring easier, more efficient, and cost-effective.
Talentpair was recently awarded the 2023 RemoteTech Overall Recruiting Solution of the Year, winning a top solution award three years running.

Name: Omniconvert
Description:
At Omniconvert, we are the the specialized data-driven solution for experimentation in eCommerce and retail, empowering companies to improve the conversion rate and customer experience.

Our Solutions:
Omniconvert Explore: A/B testing and surveys to uncover opportunities and enhance eCommerce website performance.
Omniconvert Reveal: A platform that delivers unparalleled clarity on customer behavior, helping you monitor the metrics that matter most.
Omniconvert Pulse: AI-powered customer experience (CX) monitoring to gather, analyze, and act on customer feedback.

We are nimble enough to provide personalized care and capable enough to drive impactful results. 
By blending cutting-edge technology with the expertise of our data-driven and analytics specialists, we deliver impactful results that go beyond tools. Our hands-on approach ensures every client receives personalized support, and our scale allows us to make a significant difference where it matters most.

Name: diio
Description:
diio empowers consultative selling companies by revolutionizing how they manage and operate their sales teams all powered by advanced artificial intelligence. As an expert artificial sales assistant, diio ensures salespeople adhere to company standards, while offering data-driven feedback on their customer interactions. This real-time feedback is based on the latest research in consultative selling, allowing sales teams to refine their strategies and boost overall performance.
In addition to feedback, diio offers actionable tips to enhance customer engagement. These tips are informed by both cutting-edge research and the collective wisdom of your team, eliminating the guesswork in customer interactions. Say goodbye to tedious tasks such as updating the CRM, crafting follow-up emails, and maintaining records of customer conversations; diio automates these processes for you.
With features like automated customer summaries, commitment checklists, and comparisons against custom-defined sales playbooks, diio manages the finer details so your team can focus on selling. In essence, diio provides Latin American consultative selling companies with an unparalleled competitive edge, equipping them to lead confidently in an ever-evolving sales landscape.

Name: B2Metric
Description:
B2Metric is an AI/ML-powered data analytics platform that enables marketing, data analytics, CRM teams to better understand customer trends and behaviors. It leverages real-time data to analyze user behaviors and predicts future actions of customers on digital platforms, thereby providing an opportunity to optimize marketing and growth strategies that result in higher retention and reduced customer churn rates.

B2Metric serves over 250 companies from different industries around the world, including global leaders like Allianz, Insider and AVIS.

B2Metric has successfully completed the Alchemist Accelerator Class 35, one of the world's leading development programs.

Name: CO/AI
Description:
CO/AI is a dedicated community of AI experts, enthusiasts and lifelong learners committed to equipping individuals and businesses with skills crucial for thriving in an AI-centric economy. Our mission: make one million people AI literate in the next three years.

WHAT WE BELIEVE
We're in the midst of an unparalleled AI revolution, reshaping every industry and challenging our assumptions about job security and purpose as humans. This transformation is expected to generate trillions in new wealth and radically alter existing power structures. As the world grapples with the dual possibilities of concentrated control and widespread chaos, CO/AI aims to foster a balanced approach, ensuring that the current AI wave is one that truly lifts all boats. Central to our philosophy is AI literacy, empowering humans to navigate and shape this future.

WHAT WE DO
CO/AI offers an extensive array of resources for AI literacy:
- Leaderboards: The world's most comprehensive and easily navigable databases of the leading AI tools, events and resources
- Analytics: In-depth reports and real-time dashboards on the who, what, where, when, how and what will be in AI
- Playbooks: Expert written guides on how to utilize cutting-edge tools and tech
- Agents: Thousands of tasks automatable through our own software
News & Research: Curated academic papers, industry reports, essays and current events condensed into essential insights
- Online Courses: Courses designed to familiarize users with the AI landscape and effective use of AI tools
- Professional Services: Assistance ranging from prompt training to the deployment of large scale custom AI solutions
- Newsletters: Industry-specific updates on the biggest stories daily
- Community: Exchange knowledge and opportunities with members from prestigious universities and leading companies on our Slack channel

COAI is not merely about fostering AI literacy; we're building a future where AI enhances humanity and ensures equitable benefits for all.

Name: Comunica.In
Description: Half your workforce has questions but doesn't know where to ask. Comunica.in solves this with superintelligence that delivers instant, contextual answers through WhatsApp and channels frontline workers already use. Companies like McDonald's, Bayer, Mercedes-Benz, and BRF use our communication superintelligence to connect with 1M+ employees through 150M+ communications.

Name: Tune AI
Description:
Tune AI is driving GenAI adoption at Enterprises.

We're backed by Accel, Flipkart Ventures, Together Fund, Speciale Invest, Techstars & other notable enterprise leaders as angel investors

TuneChat: Our chat app with 500K users
TuneStudio: Our playground for devs serves up to 1B tks/day
TuneAssistant: Our v1 implementation of an agentic workflow
ChainFury: Our open source prompt engine available on GitHub

Name: Boomerang
Description: Boomerangme is a Loyalty SaaS business in the box. Upsell tool for Marketing Agencies. Get additional recurring income from existing customers offering Loyalty-as-a-Service (LAAS). Use the Reseller feature including white label, pricing and currencies set up, and payment gateway connections. Book a demo. Get a $499 value after consultation.

Name: Vast.ai
Description:
Vast.ai is the market leader for low cost GPU rentals. The service connects data centers and professionals running the Vast hosting software with users who can quickly find the best deals for compute according to their specific requirements.
Vast.ai GPU rentals are ~3-5X cheaper than current alternatives. Consumer computers and consumer GPUs in particular are considerably more cost effective than equivalent enterprise hardware. We are helping the millions of underutilized consumer GPUs around the world enter the cloud computing market for the first time.

Name: Dataro
Description:
Dataro helps nonprofits unleash the power of their data to do more good in the world.

Our data analytics software turns donor data into donor predictions, helping fundraisers identify the best donors for their campaigns.

Engage and retain the right donors with the right ask using Dataro's AI donor predictions.

Name: Nucla
Description: Nucla maps every external relationship across your enterprise, providing instant visibility into every vendor, partner, and startup your company engages with — all in one centralized, searchable database. By bridging the gap between procurement and sourcing teams, Nucla eliminates silos, enhances collaboration, and empowers smarter, faster decision-making across the organization.

Name: FitBudd
Description:
FitBudd, a SaaS platform helping global health & fitness coaches grow worldwide, is a fast-paced start-up funded by marquee investors. Fitbudd solves two core problems for its market. It helps coaches better engage with and retain their clients at scale. Additionally, it allows them to be far more accessible to clients across the globe, enabling them to grow internationally. 

FitBudd offers a unified platform to make online personal training genuinely personal. Each coach gets their own website with integrated payments. They also get a portal & app to manage their clients, get insights, analytics, and more - all in one place. Clients get a mobile app to do workouts, log nutrition and track their entire fitness journey, and all the data is accessible to their coach in real time. They engage with in-app messaging and video calls. Coaches can train 100s, even 1000s, of clients at once using a combination of synchronous & asynchronous means.

The FitBudd client app has a suite of features to ensure high accountability and compliance. Clients can see their training plan, including workouts, meals, step targets - everything! The coach regularly updates their program to fit their schedule, goals, equipment, and travel.

Name: Apptile
Description: We are a design and technology startup on a mission to help millions of micro-entrepreneurs to build their brand and grow their business.

Name: Aptly
Description:
Your property management software wasn’t built to manage routine workflows, forcing you into MS Excel or Google Sheets to track common tasks such as customer onboarding, lease renewals, rehabs, move ins/outs and countless other processes. Aptly takes the best aspects of spreadsheets and databases, and puts them together with automation and collaboration tools so that your team can get more done together!

Aptly was founded in 2017 by a team of property tech SaaS entrepreneurs who built and scaled single family’s first cloud property management platform. Working with leading brands in both single and multifamily real estate, the Aptly team has in-depth industry knowledge and expertise. Headquartered in San Francisco, Aptly has embraced the remote work culture, with team members in San Diego, Buenos Aires, Las Vegas, Dallas and beyond. Aptly is integrated with leading property management and email platforms such as Yardi, RealPage, Propertyware, Appfolio, Buildium, Office365 and Gmail. Aptly is proudly backed by Accel Ventures, Slack Fund and C-Level executives from Facebook, Salesforce.com and Twilio.

Name: Binocs.co
Description:
Empowering Alternative Investors with Agentic Gen-AI: Introducing Binocs.

Binocs is a cutting-edge software platform leveraging agentic Gen-AI to revolutionize Due Diligence and Portfolio Monitoring for Alternative Investors in Private Equity and Private Credit. Recognizing the challenges of manual, time-consuming, and error-prone processes, Binocs offers a powerful automation solution.

Our platform stands out by employing an agentic Gen-AI framework that intelligently mirrors the complex workflows of Alt Funds. This enables rapid and accurate Deal Analysis, encompassing Commercial, Financial, and Operational Due Diligence, alongside continuous and insightful portfolio monitoring.

Binocs is committed to enhancing operational efficiency and strengthening risk management. Our integrated platform automates document management from all sources, utilizes AI and ML to extract and standardize financial statement data for in-depth analysis, and provides robust covenant and ESG monitoring capabilities.

Name: MeetRecord
Description: MeetRecord is a Revenue Intelligence and Sales Coaching platform that helps sales teams boost performance through AI-powered coaching and roleplay. From faster onboarding to sharper call readiness, MeetRecord enables reps to practice, get instant feedback, and consistently close more deals. Trusted by modern GTM teams worldwide.

Name: Mat3ra.com
Description:
Mat3ra.com (formerly Exabyte.io) is a technology startup company based in San Francisco, California developing a novel way to design and discover advanced materials through computer simulations.

The company’s simulation and modeling product allows materials scientists the capability to design and prototype new compounds in a rapid and cost-effective manner with applications in a variety of fields including semiconductor, clean energy, aerospace/automotive, and others.

Mat3ra.com was founded by former UC Berkeley scientists and engineers, has successfully attracted private investments, including funding by the Alchemist Accelerator, Breakout Labs, Tim Draper, Serguei Beloussov + other prominent investors, and is actively working with major US enterprises and research institutions worldwide.

More information at https://mat3ra.com/.

Name: IOMETE
Description: The IOMETE Self-Hosted Data Lakehouse Platform unifies all data - regardless of where the data resides - enabling large-scale analytics (BI/ML/AI) on the entire data set so that enterprise customers can analyze multi-terabyte to petabyte-scale data seamlessly across on-premise and/or cloud environments.

Name: LendAPI
Description:
LendAPI is a venture-backed FinTech infrastructure company empowering Banks and FinTechs to launch products in minutes. With our all-in-one platform—featuring Product Studio, Rules Studio, Pricing Engine, and Integrated Partners—we make banking and lending innovation seamless.

LendAPI is backed by Cohen Circle, Great North Ventures, AlleyCorp, Techstars, Plug and Play and Interlock Capital.

Name: Connected-Stories
Description:
Connected-Stories is a Creative Management Platform that leverages Generative and Predictive AI to empower enterprises in creating, delivering and optimizing hyper-personalized content at scale, in real-time and across any digital channels. 


“We believe that the future of marketing is real-time, adaptive, and truly personalized. At Connected-Stories, we are building the infrastructure that empowers brands to engage audiences with the right creative, at the right moment, in the right context — automatically and at scale.”

Name: Sonar
Description: Sonar is a mental health and coaching platform that helps students feel seen and supported.We partner with schools to offer 24/7 text-based wellbeing support, blending real human connection from trained Wellbeing Coaches with AI tools that make them more effective.

Name: Plot
Description: next gen marketing OS powered by video intelligence

Name: 310.ai
Description: Design of novel biomolecules is the single most impactful advancement that will be enabled by AI in the coming decade. 310 is building the AI engine that delivers this reality.

Name: Aarogya Tech
Description:
At Aarogya Tech, we’re revolutionizing healthcare with a full-stack solution that combines cutting-edge devices, intelligent software, AI-powered insights, and seamless telehealth services—all designed with a commitment to data security and privacy. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible, reliable, and efficient while safeguarding trust.
Our integrated health monitoring ecosystem brings together portable diagnostic devices, advanced AI, and cloud-based software with robust telehealth capabilities. This secure, privacy-focused platform enables real-time diagnostics, personalized recommendations, and instant physician connectivity.

Name: ProSights
Description:
ProSights is an AI platform that extracts and organizes unstructured data into a usable format at scale with complete auditability. 

ProSights offers a web app and Excel extension tailored for business teams, and a JSON API / Widget SDK for data science teams and third-party developers.

Today, ProSights is trusted by more than half of the world’s 10 largest private equity firms.

Name: Nixtla
Description:
Transforming Enterprise Decision-Making Through Advanced Time-Series AI
Secure, scalable, and easy-to-deploy forecasting and anomaly detection, trusted by Fortune 500 enterprises.

Name: Pitchit
Description: AI Agents trained to sell Telecom, Utility and Smart Home Services.

Name: ShiftRx
Description:
ShiftRx is utilizing AI and LLMs to transform healthcare staffing, scheduling, and workforce management—starting in pharmacy. 

Our platform today enables facilities to instantly build, credential, and manage reliable float and permanent staff. We started by solving PRN pharmacy staffing—and now we’re onto our next evolution, deploying autonomous agents that handle internal staffing workflows, reducing reliance on schedulers, overtime, and bloated flex pools. 

Make the shift towards staffing smarter at your pharmacy organization today.

Name: HourWork
Description:
At HourWork, we believe a happy, engaged workforce is the foundation of every successful business. That’s why we provide powerful tools to help employers connect with their teams, celebrate achievements, and gather actionable insights. From day one, HourWork ensures employees feel valued and supported, helping businesses foster a culture of communication, trust, and belonging.

Our platform simplifies the complex challenges of employee engagement and retention. With automated tools for regular check-ins, feedback collection, and recognition programs, HourWork enables employers to strengthen their relationships with team members, reduce turnover, and drive long-term business success.

Trusted by thousands of businesses across industries, HourWork empowers organizations to:

Build strong connections with their workforce
Celebrate team milestones and individual contributions
Reduce turnover and save on costly recruitment
Foster a thriving workplace culture
When employees feel valued, businesses thrive. HourWork makes it easier than ever to create workplaces where teams feel engaged, supported, and inspired to perform their best every day.

Let us help you turn workforce challenges into opportunities for growth and success.

Name: candidate.fyi
Description:
candidate.fyi is the AI-powered platform transforming how companies engage with candidates and schedule interviews.

We integrate seamlessly with your ATS, calendar, Slack, and more—powering automation where you need it most.

Our Candidate Experience Engine gives every candidate a personalized, centralized hub—complete with company insights, interview prep, progress tracking, and feedback collection.

Our AI Interview Scheduling automates even the most complex coordination tasks, eliminating back-and-forth and freeing up your recruiting team to focus on what matters.

From early-stage interviews to final rounds, candidate.fyi ensures a smooth, consistent, and branded experience at every step.

Trusted by top teams at Intercom, GoPro, Discord, Intercom, Bally’s Resorts and Casinos, and AG1.

Let’s make hiring more human—and more efficient.

Name: App0
Description:
At App0, our mission is to enable eCommerce companies to grow by creating meaningful relationships with their customers.

With App0, e-commerce brands can offer a a personal shopping assistant to every customer that lands on their website. The shopping assistant hyper personalizes the experience for every shopper leading to higher conversion rates and customer loyalty.

Join the AI revolution & unlock your business potential. App0 is being built by serial entrepreneurs & AI domain experts and is backed by the best enterprise investors like COTA Capital etc.

Reach out to us if you want to see the AI concierge in action.

Name: Ayraa
Description: Eliminate information silos with a self-organizing, real-time knowledge base & universal search.

Name: Neural
Description: Neural combines the power of proprietary space technology, AI and cloud computing to deploy solutions that turn isolated data into powerful insights and applications for industry leaders. From uncovering market trends to fine-tuning operations and understanding market shifts before they happen, we're not just predicting the future — we're building it.

Name: Statt
Description:
Meet Statt — the first AI-powered workflow platform founded by policy insiders and built for and with government relations, public affairs, and regulatory teams. Public policy professionals  are drowning in resource-intensive and repetitive deliverables to keep their leadership team and clients informed of the latest legislative and regulatory intelligence. With Statt, teams can:

- Stay informed in real-time with less noise. Monitor the Federal, State, the EU, 100+ global markets, and tens of thousands of interest groups—by issue, client, or jurisdiction—and surface only what matters.
- Eliminate  manual research and analysis. Easily summarize lengthy hearings, disparate government filings, complex legislation, and highly-technical rule-makings and comment letters.
- Automate the development of fully customizable deliverables. Produce hearing summaries, issue monitoring memos, meeting briefings, talking points, and more, freeing up your time to focus on the strategic insights that matter most.

Name: RoshAi
Description:
With over 13 years of hands-on experience in the autonomous vehicle development field, we have established ourselves as experts in creating innovative solutions specifically tailored for Indian road scenarios. We take pride in being the trusted partner for international automotive Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs), providing unparalleled expertise in the development, deployment, and validation of autonomous systems and components.

Our team is made up of highly skilled professionals who possess deep knowledge in developing, building, and optimizing the various components of autonomy control software technology. From control systems and planning algorithms to navigation solutions, localization techniques, and fleet management, our experts are well-versed in every aspect of this rapidly evolving field.

As a Center of Excellence, we are proud to have a team of industry-certified automotive domain and process experts, consultants, deployment specialists, and support engineers. This ensures that our clients receive the highest level of expertise and assistance throughout their journey with us.

We have access to state-of-the-art test tracks and proving grounds for thorough prototype testing. Additionally, our own advanced factory is equipped for seamless vehicle integration and extended testing. We understand the importance of thorough validation and ensure that every aspect of our autonomous systems and components meet the highest standards.

We are committed to driving innovation and revolutionizing the automotive industry. Join us on this exciting journey as we shape the future of autonomous vehicles, making roads safer and transportation more efficient.

Name: Origami
Description:
At Origami, we’re building the most powerful AI Agents to automate your sales team's research.

Our Agents work 24/7 like sales reps: finding new leads, enriching data, and updating your CRM — so your team can focus on selling.

Founded in 2024, we became Y Combinator's fastest growing startup and accelerate pipeline for top companies like Rho, CBRE, and Remote.com.

Name: librodepases
Description:
LDP seeks to solve the lack of access to opportunities between players, agents and soccer clubs, enabling direct contact, with the help of artificial intelligence (AI).


Through LIBRODEPASES, clubs can access premium profiles, linking their youth and professional rosters to optimize the search for players through our intelligent matching tool (AI). Clubs can directly contact other clubs, agents and players to generate opportunities and manage data to improve decision making.

Our platform includes player scouting, market information, direct messaging with other clubs, agents and players, an AI-based recommendation system and data management.

Name: VictoryXR
Description:
VictoryXR builds immersive education in spatial 3D. VXRLabs delivers safe, repeatable VR science labs—dissection, chemistry, anatomy, and more—on Meta Quest or desktop with assessments and dashboards. HoloTutor is a 3D-avatar AI tutor in Chrome/Safari, offering standards-aligned, conversational lessons and eTextbook support. VictoryXR earned HTC’s Viveport Award for the world’s best academic VR experience. Trusted by schools, districts, and homeschool families.


With educational partners like Carolina Biological and Oxford University, we have been able to develop brand-new educational encounters for VR users across the globe.

VictoryXR develops Virtual Reality content for the following systems:

 - HTC Vive
 - HTC Vive Focus
 - Windows Mixed Reality
 - Oculus Rift
 - Oculus Go
 - Oculus Quest
 - Pico
 - Lenovo Mirage (running Google Daydream)
 - Google Cardboard
…as well as Augmented Reality (AR) content for both iPhones and Android phones

Name: Clueso (YC W23)
Description:
Clueso is the fastest and easiest way to create stunning product videos. It converts raw screen recordings into studio-quality videos and step-by-step articles in minutes. No editing or design skills needed.

Here’s how it works: 
Simply record/upload a rough screen recording of your product, and Clueso will instantly transform it into a studio-quality explainer video and a step-by-step how-to article. 

Here are some of the top features:

Create videos
Clueso handles every step of the video production process. It writes your video’s script and generates a professional AI-voiceover that stays perfectly in sync with your video. Clueso also enhances your video with stunning zoom effects, highlights, captions, music, and branding!

Create SOPs/help articles
From any screen recording, Clueso’s AI automatically generates a step-by-step article with perfectly crafted steps and screenshots/GIFs. Use our AI agent to get the tone and formatting you want.

Translate your content
Translate your videos into 40+ languages. Use the translation glossary feature to fine-tune terms and ensure translation accuracy.

Easily update out-of-date content
Whenever your videos go out of date, you don’t need to remake them from scratch! Clueso makes it super-easy to replace outdated clips and voiceovers.

Name: Giga
Description: AI support agents trusted by the world’s largest B2C companies such as DoorDash

Name: VLGE
Description: VLGE is a no-code world-building platform that enables creators and brands to build immersive hyper-personalized experiences.

Name: Parambil
Description:
Parambil is an AI-powered knowledge platform built for tort law.

Products on market include automatic case validation, medical chronologies, complaints, fact sheets and more...

We'd love to hear from you.

Name: Quill.org
Description:
Quill’s mission is to help more than 10 million low-income students per year become strong writers, readers, and critical thinkers. Teachers are busier than ever and have little to no time to provide individual writing feedback to their students. Plus, while curriculum experts recommend students write for at least 30 minutes per day, 74% of eighth-grade students and 91% of twelfth-grade students do not spend more than 30 minutes per day writing. 

By building free online tools that use AI to automatically evaluate student writing, Quill provides 4th- through 12th-grade students with immediate feedback and coaching. This enables students to revise their work immediately and quickly build their literacy skills while saving their teachers precious time.

Quill is supported by grants from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, the Overdeck Family Foundation, and Google.org, among others.

Name: Waldo Photos
Description:
For professional photographers looking to sell more photos in less time, Waldo’s AI-powered sifting and sorting, mobile automated proof delivery and patented copyright protection delivers the experience their customers expect while providing pros simplicity and increased sales.

For event-goers, Waldo provides a private, ad-free, and non-toxic way to share photos with everyone who was there and those who missed but matter most.

Name: Oliv AI
Description:
At Oliv AI, we solve one of the biggest problems for revenue teams: unreliable deal data. Oliv captures Deal Intelligence from every meeting, call, and email—without any rep involvement. The result is a clear, detailed view of every deal, presented in scorecards built on trusted sales methodologies like MEDDICC, BANT, and SPICED.

Our AI agents are built for sales teams—sales managers, AEs, and RevOps—handling the work that takes them away from selling. 

Deal Driver is the first of its kind, an agent built for sales managers to stay on top of deals, track progress, and take action based on real, unbiased insights.

With Oliv AI, sales teams can bring back focus on deals, strategy and conversation.

Name: Insight Health
Description:
The Future of Independent Healthcare

Our mission is to revolutionize healthcare with AI, empowering independent practices and enabling providers to practice at the top of their license.**

We envision a healthcare system where private practices thrive, free from consolidation and administrative overload. By automating routine tasks across the care continuum—from intake to follow-up—providers will spend more time on patient care, decision-making, and meaningful interactions. Our goal is to redefine healthcare technology—not to replace human expertise, but to enhance it and improve the overall care experience.

About Us

At Insight Health, we’ve assembled a team uniquely equipped to transform healthcare by blending the expertise of leading physicians with cutting-edge AI and data engineering talent. This combination positions us at the forefront of healthcare’s AI revolution.

Our co-Chief Medical Officers, Dr. Pankaj Gore and Dr. Eric Stecker, bring years of leadership experience in neurosurgery and cardiology, ensuring our solutions address the most critical healthcare challenges. Complementing this medical expertise, our tech leaders, with experience at companies like Segment and Twilio, bring Silicon Valley innovation into healthcare. 

Healthcare is at a pivotal moment, with AI adoption accelerating rapidly. By joining our team, you’ll be at the heart of this transformation, working with top minds in both medicine and technology. We’re not just part of the change in healthcare, we’re driving it.

Name: AppMagic
Description:
AppMagic is an accurate and easy-to-use tool for exploring mobile apps market. Access data on 14 million apps and 4.6 million publishers to gain a competitive edge, discover innovation, and boost your revenue.

We simplify complex data into actionable insights with an intuitive interface. Whether you’re a developer, marketer, or publisher, AppMagic empowers you to make informed decisions that drive success.

— Market Research: 18 tools and 500+ tags for precise data selection.
— UA Improvement: Over 150+ million creatives.
— Product Analysis:  A curated library of IAP monetization strategies and a LiveOps Calendar featuring expert commentary on top-grossing events.

Reach out to us and we will show you around!

Name: Vaionex Corporation
Description:
At Vaionex Corporation, we lead the charge in AI and blockchain innovation, empowering enterprises with cutting-edge solutions for transformative growth. Our meticulously crafted product suite leverages AI algorithms, machine learning, and data science to propel businesses to new heights of success. 

Our AI-driven solutions, including Legaliser,PitchAi, and Makeover, exemplify our commitment to streamlining processes and enhancing organizational efficiency. Legaliser revolutionizes contract analysis, while PitchAi offers powerful analytics for VCs to analyze and score hundreds of pitches effortlessly. Makeover redefines interior and fashion customization with AI, turning the ordinary into extraordinary.

In the blockchain sphere, our platforms anchored by the robust BSV blockchain are revolutionizing industries. Timeseal authenticates data timestamps, Relysia redefines Bitcoin wallet experiences, and Satolearn offers immersive insights into the Bitcoin universe. Tegment seamlessly merges gaming with blockchain potential. 

Beyond products, our ecosystem leverages the security and scalability of the BitcoinSV blockchain. We offer bespoke consulting services and platform development, supported by our seasoned team of developers and industry experts. Their expertise ensures rapid development cycles and sets a benchmark for excellence in the industry.

Explore our suite of offerings: www.legaliser.com, www.pitchai.com, makeover.ai, www.timeseal.com, www.relysia.com, www.satolearn.com, and www.tegment.com.

Name: Wyng
Description:
Wyng is at the forefront of B2C marketing technology, offering an AI-powered Data Capture & Engagement (DCE) Platform designed for global enterprises.

Marketing teams use the Wyng platform to create digital experiences (ie. quizzes, promotions, gamified instant wins, preferences centers, and more) that engage consumers at key moments along their journey, capture valuable zero-party and first-party data, and deliver personalized promotions. By leveraging Wyng, brands can build and strengthen direct relationships with consumers, enrich their customer database, and improve marketing efficiency and agility - all while ensuring compliance with data privacy laws.

Wyng serves over 250 global brands, including Disney, Estée Lauder, Sony, Tractor Supply Company, and Unilever. To learn more, visit www.wyng.com.

Name: Argoid AI (an Amagi company)
Description:
Argoid helps businesses deliver personalized experiences across various digital touch points with hyper-personalized recommendations. We want to enable businesses to grow their revenue with 1:1 personalization for Streaming platforms. Argoid produces the best conversion rates possible with its real-time AI driven recommendation system .

At Argoid, we offer personalized content recommendations to amp-up viewer journeys. Our personalized recommendations include, Home page Recommendations, Similar Movie Recommendations, For You Recommendations, Recently Watched and more.

Argoid  builds a deep understanding of each viewer to auto-deliver the most relevant recommendations. Our real-time content recommendations are powered by viewers’ intent and browsing history, among a billion data points.

Our team  comes with a diverse and complementary skill set, dedication, and experience.We learn from each other, our customers, and follow the latest industry trends to ensure that  our customers gets the best results 

To learn more about how you can amplify your growth with a recommendation engine, Request a demo at www.argoid.ai

Name: QuantHub
Description:
QuantHub powers the next generation of learning. We help educators and businesses create and deliver data and AI skill-building experiences that are fast, flexible, and future-focused.

From AI literacy in universities to custom curriculum for regulated industries, we equip people with the skills that matter—before they become a gap.

Our adaptive platform combines learning science, automation, and human expertise to rapidly build and scale content for the AI age. Because in a world where tech moves fast, learning has to move faster.

Let’s future-proof your team, your classroom, your community.

Name: Passio AI
Description:
Passio is an AI company spun out from the Stanford Research Institute (SRI International). Passio's Mobile AI Platform enables developers and companies to rapidly build and deploy mobile AI applications. 

Passio's easy-to-use Mobile AI SDKs reach millions of users who use Passio every day to transform their health, fitness, homes, businesses and lives. Passio Nutrition-AI SDK is the world's leading food tracking AI technology powering MyFitnessPal, Sydney Health, Simple Life, Sharecare, Vivante Health and others. Passio Paints-AI is the first AI + Augmented Reality home-remodeling SDK that supports sales of home remodel products for Jazeera Paints and others. 

Headquartered in Menlo Park with the team around the globe, Passio’s mission is to enhance human life with the power of AI. 

To learn more, visit www.passio.ai

Name: Soopra.ai
Description:
Soopra AI lets you create a smart, digital version of yourself or your brand that’s available 24/7. Whether you're a coach, educator, creator, or business, your AI persona can chat, teach, answer questions, and even help you earn — all while staying true to your voice and expertise.

Now with enterprise support, Soopra also helps businesses scale customer support, training, and internal knowledge sharing — using AI agents that feel personal, helpful, and human.

Name: Curi Bio
Description:
"Human Data for Next Generation Medicines"

Curi Bio unlocks novel workflows and critical human data to inform R&D decision-making. Through an integrated platform featuring advanced 3D tissue models of disease, biosystems enabling clinically relevant functional analyses, and AI/ML-enabled insights, Curi Bio merges functional and analytical assessments for  drug safety, efficacy, and potency

Name: PineGap.ai
Description: PineGap.AI is an AI-powered equity research platform built for institutional equity analysts and portfolio managers, helping them automate daily workflows across idea generation and validation, new companies ramp-up, and earnings analysis.

Name: ResoluteAI
Description:
ResoluteAI is the research platform for science. Foundation lets commercial science enterprises search aggregated scientific, regulatory, and business databases simultaneously. Nebula is our enterprise search tool for science. Combined with our interactive analytics and downloadable visualizations, ResoluteAI helps make connections that lead to breakthrough discoveries. Used in R&D, medical affairs, post market surveillance, and pharmacovigilance by scientific organizations around the world, ResoluteAI won the BCS Search Industry Award for Most Promising Start-Up in 2021.

For more information, visit www.resolute.ai

Name: Luster
Description:
AI Role Play is just the beginning...

Say Hello to Predictive Enablement 
Luster is a first-of-its-kind skill proficiency mapping engine and AI-powered training solution designed to make your entire go-to-market team predictive. Using skill data, calendar intelligence, and proprietary AI, Luster diagnoses your teams skill gaps, predicts where those gaps are about to erode revenue, and prescribes custom enablement resources to ensure that poor performance is a thing of the past.

Gone are the days of realizing a performance gap after a lost deal or bad call. 

With Luster, your customers are no longer collateral damage from a lack of proper training and enablement.

Name: Wuru
Description: Wúru is a data analytics company that offers innovation, productivity and cost efficiency for healthcare providers around the world to ensure that all their management decisions can be made based on evidence.

Name: Trice
Description:
Trice Imaging is the world’s leading cloud-based medical imaging solution. Our innovative technology has made it easier than ever for medical professionals to instantly and efficiently manage images, collaborate with colleagues, share with patients, and integrate with EHRs from anywhere. 

Trice Imaging, Inc. is a privately owned company at the intersection of wireless technology and cloud image management. Trice mobilizes medical images by sending them from any imaging modality to any mobile device. Physicians receive remote access to images, clips and reports, secure storage and the ability to collaborate with other physicians. Patients receive high-quality medical images that they can print, store, publish and send to family and friends or to doctors for a second opinion. 
Trice Imaging’s patented technology is a value added service to any medical imaging system or diagnostic software and won “Best Mobile Innovation for Health” and “Best Mobile service for women” at the 20th Global Mobile Awards. Trice is available in 56 countries and has patient and clinical users all around the world. Trice has clinical users in 143 countries across 6 continents. Trice is an FDA Class I medical device and ISO 13485:2016 certified. Trice Imaging is HIPAA, GDPR, and MDR compliant.

Trice is headquartered in San Diego, California, and has offices in Stockholm, Sweden. For more information, visit us at www.triceimaging.com. 

Learn more about how our innovative solutions can transform the way you manage medical images by visiting http://www.triceimaging.com or connecting with us at https://www.triceimaging.com/lets-connect.

Name: IrisAgent
Description:
IrisAgent is a leader in customer support automation with AI-powered answers, tagging, and workflows that boosts agent productivity and automates tickets at scale. Get started with AI Agents for chat, email, and voice in just a few minutes. Experience AI that self-learns and scales with your needs. 

We take simple, repetitive tickets off your support team’s plate, but we’re more than just a chatbot. Unlike other players in this space, we take a 360-degree view of customer support operations, leveraging product and user context to gain meaningful insight into the ‘why’ behind tickets associated with bugs, performance issues, and outages to create support workflows and recommend operational improvements.

Improve customer happiness and supercharge your support operations by booking a demo here - https://www.irisagent.com/get-a-demo

Name: Optii
Description: Optii is a hotel operations technology that optimizes labor, streamlines operations, and empowers teams across housekeeping, service delivery, internal communication, and preventative maintenance. Optii is an MCR portfolio company and is used by hotels and resorts around the world including La Cantera Resort & Spa (Benchmark), The Don Cesar (Host), Okada Manilla Resort & Casino, Le Meridien, Doma Hotels, IHG and more.

Name: YData
Description: YData helps data science teams to accelerate their AI development with improved data quality

Name: Inkle
Description: Inkle is an accounting and tax SaaS platform designed to help U.S. startups manage their compliance from inception. It provides software and services for automating deadline alerts, state and federal filings, and AI-powered bookkeeping. Trusted by over 6% of YC companies globally, Inkle offers on-demand, scalable, and affordable solutions delivered over chat with US-licensed professionals.

Name: Claap
Description:
Claap leverages AI to automate post sales meeting tasks — meeting notes, followup emails, CRM enrichment — and uncover insights so revenue leaders understand why they win (or lose) deals.

On average, sales reps save 20+ minutes after each meeting with workflow automations, and revenue leaders increase their win rate up to 30% with deal insights and AI-assisted coaching.

Claap is backed by Headline and LocalGlobe, and works with 300+ clients including companies like Revolut, Qonto, Scoreplay, Teale or Join.

Start for free on www.claap.io

Name: Akiflow
Description:
At Akiflow we help users to manage their time wisely by offering an all-in-one productivity hub, where you can access and plan all your tasks. 

Focusing on individual productivity, our app uses the time blocking methodology to help professionals make the most out of their time and design a balanced routine.

Our core features are:

- Inbox consolidation. Through smart integrations, you can pull tasks from other productivity and communication tools and create a unified view of all your tasks.
- Time blocking. Drag and drop the tasks to pin them into your calendar and block some time for deep focus.
- Share availability. Let your teammates know what is your plan for the day and what are the free spots on your schedule.

Sign up for a free trial: https://akiflow.com/

Name: Metafide
Description: Metafide is a predictive finance platform that turns skill into reward. We blend human intuition and AI with gameplay and on-chain mechanics so players can compete in real-time and win with precision. Metafide makes financial markets more dynamic, accessible, and engaging, without relying on chance or capital.

Name: Thesys
Description: C1 by Thesys: The Generative UI API for building engaging AI products.

Name: Locale.ai
Description:
Locale.ai is a sales automation platform that uses AI agents to streamline sales processes. What makes us unique is that our AI agents can be trained on YOUR data, perfectly replicating your team's exact workflows.

Our AI agents execute processes like filling custom fields in your CRM, following up with prospects, and using that data to score leads intelligently. 

This saves AEs over 3 hours/day, freeing them from data entry and admin tasks, and allowing them to focus on closing deals faster.

Check us out at https://www.locale.ai/

Name: Muir AI
Description:
Muir AI is an early-stage startup building a talented team passionate about solving the world’s biggest problem: climate change. We aim to make an impact at the gigaton scale – truly changing the course of the world’s climate. 

To do this, we generate the foundational carbon intelligence required for corporations to rapidly measure and reduce scope 3 emissions. Rapid insights lead to real action: mitigate supply chain risk, address highest emitting suppliers, monitor deforestation commitments, invest in high impact renewable projects.

Name: Lokyata
Description:
AI-Powered Cash Flow Analysis and Loan Decisioning

Increase profit, reduce risk, and enhance borrower satisfaction with Lokyata’s AI-driven decisioning, analytics, and automation platform.
